home.headline: UI/UX Designer and No-code Developer
home.subline: I'm Ali, a UX / UI Designer at INFOSTSTACK, where I craft intuitive user experiences. Outside of work, I focus on creating personal design projects.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Ali is a Lahore-based UI/UX designer with a passion for crafting intuitive and user-friendly experiences. With expertise in transforming complex challenges into simple, elegant solutions, Ali's work spans digital interfaces, interactive experiences, and the seamless integration of design and technology.

InfoStack Tech.achievements: Applied user-centered design principles to create impactful digital experiences, leveraging expertise in user behavior, front-end technologies, and design tools to lead successful projects. Thrived in fast-paced environments, solving complex challenges with creativity and innovation while collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop and deliver cutting-edge products. Enhanced user engagement and satisfaction through thoughtful design and execution.

My Studio.achievements: Designed professional and engaging thumbnails that boosted client engagement and click-through rates, while delivering intuitive UI/UX designs for web and mobile applications to enhance user satisfaction and usability. Developed no-code solutions using tools like Webflow and Bubble, streamlining development for clients. Crafted memorable and impactful logo designs that strengthened brand identity for businesses, and collaborated with diverse clients to deliver a wide range of design projects, meeting tight deadlines with precision.

Figma.description: Proficient in designing intuitive user interfaces, creating design systems, and collaborating seamlessly with Figma

Framer.description: Skilled in building interactive prototypes and responsive designs using Framer

Photoshop.description: Skilled in editing, retouching, and creating visual assets using Photoshop

Notion.description: Efficient in organizing tasks, managing projects, and creating knowledge bases with Notion

FigJam.description: Proficient in brainstorming and collaborating visually with FigJam

Figma Slides.description: Experienced in designing engaging presentations with Figma Slides

Illustrator.description: Expert in creating vector graphics, illustrations, and logo designs with Illustrator

ClickUp.description: Skilled in managing tasks, workflows, and projects efficiently using ClickUp
